sect1.title: Build CFLAGS
sect1.para: CFLAGS during the building of cross tools must not be set.
To disable CFLAGS and CXXFLAGS use the following command:
Now we will add these to ~/.bashrc, just in case you have to exit and restart building later:

screen.userinput: echo unset CFLAGS >> ~/.bashrc echo unset CXXFLAGS >> ~/.bashrc
